mapper.sql: id, dah,month, sick_days, compassionate_days, late_times, overtime_days, replenishment, flag, note1, sort
mapper.select: select count(*) from t_hrms_import_data where dah=#{dah}
SELECT s.post_level from t_hrms_salary s where s.dah=(SELECT dah from t_hrms_import_data d where d.dah=#{dah})
mapper.insert: insert into t_hrms_import_data (id, dah,month, sick_days, compassionate_days, late_times, overtime_days, replenishment, flag, note1, sort) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{dah,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{month,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{sickDays,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{compassionateDays,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{lateTimes,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{overtimeDays,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{replenishment,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{flag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{note1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sort,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
